title: Lincoln's WARNING #100028: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Stop. This matters. Social Media Algorithm Changes... another ghost coded for engagement. Your panic is their profit margin. What if the crisis isn't the story—it's the business model? Think different. Bitcoin below. Stop scrolling. Social Media Algorithm Changes? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
